name: OTT Clicker (v0.9.1)
description:
If it doesn't show up, click this: https://get.adobe.com/flashpla...

If a link isn't opening when you get a prize, it may be because of your adblocker

Update0.9.1: -Fixed OttPS not saving -3 more shop items Update0.9.0: -SAVING AND LOADING FULLY WORKING -New loading screen -Fixed 2 James Merchants Update0.8.6: -Save and load testing PLEASE WORK LOL -Position changes -Minor bug fixes Update0.8.5: -Added "More Upgrades" Tab -Better fonts -2 More upgrades -Stuff tab -Crunchy Yoi -Pictures of James Update0.8.0: -Frosti LoadingScreen (placeholder) -Smoother Clicking -New upgrade -New Click sound -Fixed mute/unmute buttons -Saving/Loading coming soon Update0.7.5: -Lots of experiments completed -Fixed prizes -Added Reflex Growl -Fixed Previews -Minor positioning Update0.7.1: -Attempt to fix link failure Update0.7.0: -Added 2 more upgrades -Added Prizes Prototype -Minor bug fixes
